EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Big Data Day_Chicago_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/big-data-day]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Day in Chicago. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, November 3rd, 2016 Time: 1:00 - 4:00 PM Location: Synchrony Financial, 222 W Adams Street, Chicago, IL 60606
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact Stuart Ransom at sransom@pivotal.io <[[mailto:sransom@pivotal.io]]>.
